reviews.comments: No me alcanzan las palabras de agradecimiento para Inés y Luis. Inés es una host excelente, siempre accesible a la distancia, y Luis hasta nos vino a ayudar a las 10 de la noche un día que nos quedamos afuera porque las llaves quedaron adentro. El departamento es hermoso, con una vista de ensueño, y tiene gimnasio, sauna y piscina. Lamentablemente no pudimos utilizar la piscina porque la temporada comienza en octubre, pero de todas formas vale la pena al 100%. Está en una zona ideal para turistas.

Estuvimos de viaje por BsAs para casarnos allí y decidimos alquilar el departamento para tener nuestro espacio en unos días súper movilizantes e importantes... Poder llegar a ese departamento y sentirlo "nuestro hogar" fue maravilloso. Divino el apartamento, excelente y muy cálida la atención de María Inés, aun a la distancia. Sin dudas, lo recomendamos y pensamos regresar.

Ines es muy buena y amable.  Siempre pendiente de que estemos bien!!!
El barrio es muy lindo y tiene muchos lugares para salir, negocios cerca y la gente es tranquila. Es un barrio muy seguro al igual que el departamento y es muy hermoso, es igual a las fotos. Tiene una vista increíble
Lo recomiendo!!!
Muy buen departamento

El departamento de María Inés es muy confortable y bien situado en la ciudad. Hemos pasado una semana muy agradable y si regresamos a Buenos Aires alojaremos en el mismo departamento sin ninguna hesitación. Aunque viva en Canadá, María Inés fue muy disponible por teléfono y tiene todo arreglado con un servicio que so ocupa del departamento.

El departamento es tal como aparece en las fotos.  Tiene una vista impresionante de Buenos Aires.  Muy confortable y acogedor.  El wifi funciona perfectamente.  La cocina muy bien equipada.  Tiene una lavandería en el subsuelo que funciona con fichas que compras a una cuadra.  Logras sentirte como en casa.  María Ines es extraordinaria, siempre está pendiente de que todo esté bien durante tu estadía y hace recomendaciones acertadisimas. Contesta tus mensajes al segundo. Ninguna queja.  Por algo es una súper host!

Hemos disfrutado la experiencia de hospedarnos en el departamento de Maria Ines, un hermoso y confortable lugar, ella es una anfitriona esplendida, nos facilito toda la informacion necesaria para hacer de nuestra estadia en Buenos Aires un recuerdo maravilloso, muy recomendable.
A great place close to many of the popular attractions in BA. The hosts were friendly and helped us out a lot. Highly recomended.
The place was great, cosy and excellent location. Maria was very helpful with tips. Highly recommend it if you want to be close to restaurants, pubs and clubs around Palermo.
Nice building and facilities of pool etc. Flat is tired. Location not quite in the buzz of 'Palermo'.

This listing is a great place to stay, on the border of Palermo and Recoletta. Great facilities, easy to get around, great views of the city and a great swimming pool for cooling off after hot days out. 
Communication was fast and easy. We really appreciated the flexibility and friendliness of the host.
Would stay here again
Tudo muito bom

We had a very pleasant stay in the apartment and very much appreciated  Marias kindness and hospitality ,along with her flexibility of our late Check-out!!!!!! Communication before and during our stay was excellent!
The views from the balcony and from the rooftop really are amazing!
The Apartment is very well equiped ,and is just as beautiful as in the pictures.Very authentic neighbourhood,little shops,supermarkets,restaurants and cafés are nearby.
We would return any time!!!!

Beautiful apartment! It was exactly as described. Both Maria and her son Luis were very helpful. My husband and I managed to get a head cold and it was in the middle of our 2 months South America holiday from Australia but this was a very comfortable home away from home for us. We managed to rest and recoup here very comfortably. Lovely location.
Great location, superb apartment.  Comfortable bed.  Safe building with a doorman.  Incredible value.
Maria was great and her place is fantastic. She graciously let us stay until 5pm when checkout is at 11.

Very pretty apartment with everything you need situated in a safe neighborhood with lots of bars, restaurants and shops in walking distance. The gym and rooftop pool area are amazing. I highly recommend staying there!!!

L’appartement de Maria Ines est fidèle aux photographies, et il est surtout à la hauteur de son prix: 70 euros par nuit.
Il est très agréable à vivre, la vue est superbe, et la superficie est parfaite pour deux personnes. 
Maria Ines est une personne loyale et disponible, c’est une hôte sur qui l’on peut compter. 
Nous avons adoré notre séjour et attendons avec impatience le prochain, dans cet appartement précisément! Nous le recommandons sans hésiter.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado, limpo, claro ,  tem a grande vantagem de ter um lavabo e um banheiro  completo,  tem  todas as comodidades necessárias para se hospedar  , silencioso,  um local seguro , prédio com portaria 24 horas e uma vista bonita principalmente no por do sol. 
Quanto ao nosso check in , foi realizado pelo Luís que nos mostrou todo o facilidades disponibilizadas no apartamento, então não conhecemos a nossa hostess Maria Inês. Quando ao checkout , como nosso vôo era na madrugada, ela permitiu que o  fizéssemos mais tarde, sem cobrança adicional . 
Nós, eu e meu marido, ficamos muito satisfeitos por termos escolhido esse apartamento e o recomendamos, sem sombra de dúvida. Se você quiser passar uns dias em Buenos Ayres, e quiser se sentir "em casa", acredito que você fará uma ótima escolha.

Great, central place in BA. Palermo is an awesome neighborhood, and our favorite BA Places were in the neighborhood. It’s easy to grab a cab anywhere from this place. It feels safe, clean and modern. And Maria is incredibly responsive as these two gringos tried to figure things out. Thanks again!

Maria Inês é ótima. Preocupada ao extremo com seus anfitriões. O Luis nos recebeu super tarde e foi ótimo nas recomendações. O local do apartamento é ótimo, com bons locais para comer e caminhar. Tb não fica longe do metrô. Se vc nunca foi a Buenos Aires este é o apartamento perfeito!

We can`t described how we loved the apartment! It was simply incredible and even better than we expected!
We felt so at home in Buenos Aires during our stay and that is what made our stay perfect. 
Luis was super helpful and helped us a lot during our stay! He was always reachable! Although we didn`t meet Maria Ines in person the communication was flawless and on the first day she sent Luis to give us the key and explain us everything. He gave us really good tips concerning food and sights. 
The location of the apartment was amazing and it is only 10minutes away from the metro station which will take you to Plaza the Mayo. 
The view and the apartment itself were breathtaking and no words can describe how we felt in Buenos Aires. It was by far the most beautiful place from AIrbnb that we have ever stayed in. We will defintely come back one day. The WIFI was really fast and the bathroom was clean and the shower was really hot. The kitchen and the house is really good equipped. Even several travel guides are layed out for the guests to use. 
Thank you for everything!
In the middle of the action. All you need is nearby.

Eu recomendo a hospedagem neste apartamento. Tive todo suporte e apoio necessário da Maria Inês e do Luis durante minha estadia. Perdemos o voo de ida e ao comunicar com Maria Inês o ocorrido, ela nos tranquilizou e o Luis estava nos esperando de madrugada ao chegar no apartamento. Durante a estadia Maria Inês nos ligou para perguntar se estava tudo bem. Maria Inês é uma ótima anfitriã. O apartamento é realmente como nas fotos. No meu caso foram duas pessoas, eu e minha esposa, não temos o que reclamar, só elogiar.
I would recommend this place.

Fomos muito bem recebidos pelo Luis que, por problemas no vôo, nos recebeu as 2h da manhã. Tudo muito limpo e organizado, muito confortável e aconchegante. Não existe outros prédios na frente o que dá muita privacidade e uma boa vista da sacada. Apartamento excelente, ótima localização, bairro seguro.  Varias linhas de ônibus ao redor (100 e 200m) e duas ótimas estações de metro perto (cerca de 800m).

The apartment was fantastic- clean, great view, and had everything we needed. Check in was a little confusing as it was difficult to coordinate with a host in another country. If you want independence, this is a great place, but do not expect a lot of suggestions or help with the city. There are a lot of great guidebooks in the apartment though (although somewhat outdated but still mostly helpful)!
Great one bedroom condo in a modern building. The place was clean, communication was easy and the area is great. Really recommend.

Thank you Maria for the wonderful stay at your place. We very much enjoyed our stay in Buenos Aries thanks to your hospitality and good advice regarding the city. We have since recommended your listing to others we have met on our travels. Hope you the best.
John and Joan
Beautiful apartment in a great location with a stunning view. Couldn't have been happier staying there. Maria was very responsive and check-in was simple. Would absolutely stay again.

Maria's apartment is a very attractive unit located on the 16th floor in a modern apartment building with 24 hour security.  You can not leave or enter the building without going by a security employee.  There are a number of cafes in the area, a supermarket and Santander ATM close by.  Maria and her local manager keeps in close contact and they are quick to respond to any questions.

Great flat, looks just like the pictures. Maria was a really good host and was kind enough to put two cold beers and a bottle of water in the fridge for us for when we arrived. Good location -safe to walk around at night. Highly recommended.
O apartamento é exatamente o que estávamos procurando. O apto fica 10 quadras do metro o que facilitou muito nossa locomoção. E tudo no apto parecia estar limpo, gostamos muito!!

It was such joy to stay at Maria's place. Great apartment for the two of us with an incredible view over an amazing (and super huge) metropolis city! Maria was very friendly and easy to communicate with. Make sure to take Uber taxis to everywhere you go in the city. Extremely cheap and fast way of travelling. Security downstairs made us feel safe at home. Would love to come back one day. Thank you Maria! Big kiss from Amsterdam. M & M.
Great flat. Great host. Fast and clear communication the whole way through.
Take the trains and buses. Make the trip to Iguazú. It's worth it!

The apartment is great, and walkable to most of the best parts of the city, as well as about 15 minutes to the subway.   We had a great time in the apartment and in the surrounding neighborhood.  The apartment was comfortable, even in the summer heat.
Maria was awesome. Her apartment was cute and in a great location. She was very responsive. You will enjoy your stay.

My wife and I went to BsAs for our honeymoon and picked a great place. We had emailed Maria a few different times and were immediately responded to. The place was spotless, fillled with light and as described.
The security was a great "plus" and treated us like locals.
Located in the heart of Palermo was perfect as we walked to so many locations.
Maria was the perfect host...

My wife stayed for 3 weeks and we are very satisfied with the apartment.
The apartment was very clean and modern in a building with gated security around the clock. The guards are very helpful with any questions and will call for taxis if you need it. The 16th floor gives an awesome view of Buenos Aires. The location is close to many of the restaurants and attractions of Palermo. 
Maria was extremely helpful and will answer any questions or information you need. She will  have a bottle of wine waiting for you in the room.
We highly recommend this apartment  :)
Awesome flat in a wonderful city. Very charming and helpful hosts. Definitely a Recommendation.

Tivemos uma experiência muito agradável no apartamento da Maria Inês. Mais confortável do que imaginamos, o apartamento é melhor do que as fotos mostram! Muito bem montado e não sentimos falta de nada. Um dia depois da chegada, percebemos o quanto era bem localizado, impressão que só aumentou com o passar dos dias. Gostamos muito e se voltarmos a Buenos Aires será nossa primeira opção de hospedagem!

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Zeit in diesem Apartment, es ist absolut zu empfehlen: ein echter Glücksgriff! Die Wohnung befindet in perfekter Lage für ein Stadturlaub, weil sich alles ganz in der Nähe befindet – sie könnte nicht besser gelegen sein. Sie befindet sich im 16 Stockwerk und bietet einen atemberaubenden Blick über Palermo bis zum Fluss. Vom Balkon aus kann man erst ermessen wie unglaublich groß das Häusermeer von Buenos Aires ist. Das Beste: Auf dem Dach befindet sich ein schöner Pool sowie Sonnenliegen, Sitzgelegenheiten, ein kleines Gym und ein Grillplatz. Die Sonnenuntergänge, die vom Dach aus beobachtet werden können (das haben wir fast jeden Abend getan) sind unbezahlbar. Die Wohnung selbst hat viele Vorzüge: sie ist wirklich sauber und sicher, unten gibt es einen Portier, das Internet läuft flüssig etc. Die Gastgeberin Maria Ines ist unglaublich freundlich, hilfsbereit und rund um die Uhr telefonisch oder per (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) erreichbar. Sie hat uns viele schöne Tips gegeben bezüglich Restaurants, Museen, Verkehr, Sehenswürdigkeiten etc. Die Wohnung ist super ausgerüstet und hat wirklich alles, was man zum Kochen braucht. Es gibt ein riesiges Bockspringbett (was mir sehr wichtig war), in dem ich herrlich geschlafen habe. Zudem gibt es eine leicht zu bedienende Klimaanlage. Was noch erwähnt werden soll, Maria Ines hat auch unseren Flughafentransport organisiert. Ich kann die Wohnung wirklich empfehlen! Ein Hotel in der Qualität würde sicherlich das dreifache Kosten.
Absolutely amazing time and experience . Recommend to any body !

This is a beautiful apartment in a great neighborhood. Short walk to the subway, even shorter for buses. The apartment has an awesome cityscape view, especially at night. Maria Ines called to check in on us and her caretakers were helpful. No problems at all, and I would definitely return!

Excellent experience. Maria was very communicative and flexible and everything was as described. The apartment is clean, comfortable, attractive, and in a convenient part of town, close to Recoleta and Palermo. Would definitely stay again. Thank you!
Maria Ines is very friendly, attentive, answer immediately, I did not have any problem with her.
Great apartment, has everything you need. was really a nice experience

We loved our stay in Buenos Aires! Apart from the incredible city, Maria Ines took such good care of us. If there are any questions she will answer straight away and help wherever she can. Also she kindly organized a taxi for us from the airport-big thanks again to Flávio our driver for being so kind to us.
The apartment is just as described. Very modern and cosy flat with a nice view of the city from the balcony. Everything is within waking distance! I'd recommend walking around the area, there are so many nice cafes and little boutique shops.
We would love to come back !

Maria Ines was an extremely responsive, welcoming and helpful host.  She answered any questions we had within minutes!  She even told me how to ask for laundry tokens in Spanish.  She also gave us restaurant and sightseeing suggestions, which we really appreciated.
The apartment was immaculate, well-equipped and very secure.  The bed is very comfortable, and the shower is great.  We enjoyed having coffee or a glass of wine on the terrace, with it's sweeping view of the city.
The neighborhood is conveniently located - within walking distance to Palermo Soho, Recoleta with many great small restaurants and cafes nearby. 
We stayed in the apartment for 9 days, and hated to leave.  We cannot recommend this apartment or host highly enough!

Christian, der Mann von Maria, hat uns unglaublich nett begrusst und geholfen um unsere Orientierung  in diese grosse Stadt zu finden. Die Wohnung ist einmalig, und von hier aus geniesst man eine wunderschöne Kulisse. Alles von Fernseher bis zum Klimaanlage functioniert einwandfrei. Die Zimmer sind geschmacksvoll dekoriert. Vielen Dank!!! Es hat unsere Reise entspannt gemacht hier zu Wohnen. Stephanie  und Philip Sorry for my mistakes in German
Everything was more than perfect

We felt that we were very warmly welcomed into their apartment.  There was a bottle of wine on the table and beer in the refrigerator.  What more could you ask for.  They met us at the apartment to show us around and give us a good orientation of  the building and the city.  We were able to find the subway by walking to get into the center of the city.

The apartment was beautiful, tastefully decorated, with great amenities and views, close to many attractions and great restaurants. Our stay was very comfortable and delightful, and we'd love to come back on our next visit to Buenos Aires!
Lovely modern apartment in a great location. Bars and restaurants close by as well as two subway stations. Maria is super responsive and everything went smoothly. Would recommend. Thank you Maria

The appartment was immaculate and fully met the description. We did not meet our host however communication was good via email. She had provided us with local information and recommendation s and gave great advice. Great location for getting around BA & felt very safe. Perfect. Would certainly recommend.
Excellent location, close to best parts of BA for tourists.  Maria is very responsive to all questions and Luis is great at helping you settle in.  I am already planning to book this apartment again!
Amazon apartment. Ines is there for you and whatever you need. Every picture is true and location is greate.. She is considerete ande ven provides poll towels.. Perfect.
Notre hotesse nous a tres bien accueillis par l'entremise de collegues sur place à BA. L'appartement était parfait bien que plus éloigné du metro.

Great location in Palermo, with fantastic views over the city. The apartment is modern and secure, well furnished, and comfortable. Ines gave some good recommendations on things to see and do, and was always quick to respond.  We'd certainly recommend staying here.
Maria was great, gave us lots of information about the neighbourhood, restaurants, tourist attractions and others. She was always was in contact to make sure we were ok.

Fantastic place. Great location, very close to domestic airport and trendy cafes and bars in Palermo. Close access to Subte. Clean and well equipped. Modern and secure apartment. Host was great, made excellent recommendations about cafes and restaurants in the area. Made us feel very welcome.

We were here for over 2 weeks and loved out stay! The apartment has everything one needs, a beautiful view, and great location. Luis was very helpful at all times. It was winter, so the rooftop pool was not filled, but one can only imagine how this place must be in the summer! I'd highly recommend staying here. If we come back to BA, we hope to be able to stay here again.

We both had a lovely stay at Maria's beautiful apartment, with the most fabulous view. There is all the attention to detail you could hope for. Maria is a very generous and helpful hostess. She even instantly helped us via text with things like finding a local laundrette (round the corner) to booking a taxi for our early morning flight. Everything was perfect during our stay. Thank you!

Se hospedar no apartamento de Maria Ines, foi uma experiência muito agradável. O apartamento é bem localizado e é mais bonito do que nas fotos e é perfeito para quem quer se sentir morando em BA. Não falta nada, ela pensou em tudo para você se sentir em sua própria casa. Eu e minha esposa adoramos. Gosto de cozinhar e no apartamento tem tudo que você precisa. Recomendo para quem quer se sentir um morador da (URL HIDDEN) certeza, quando voltar a Buenos Aires, ficarei hospedado nesse apartamento.
Great location and very gracious hosts. We had everything we needed and enjoyed our stay very much.

Maria was an informative, knowledgable and caring host from the moment I made inquiries about her apartment as this was my first airbnb experience. She provided me information in a timely manner and additionally secured a pick up from the airport. All of these efforts satisfied my husband and myself as Buenos Aires is a big city with hurdles to deal with when traveling. 

Maria also had Luis meet us at the apartment which was comforting. Maria also had guide books and maps handy with suggestions. 

The apartment is true to its advertisement it is in "the center of the action". An easy walk to many cultural sites, the subway and supermarkets. This made my husband and my time well spent as we were able to soak up the expansive and diverse culture of Buenos Aires. The apartment is very spacious with high ceilings, comfortable living room furniture; also clean from top to bottom. 

The kitchen is filled with pots, pans, utensils and other amenities such as basic spices to assist you. My husband and I never really acclimated to eating on Buenos Aires time of after 10 pm; therefore the kitchen became the focal point of our stay after 7 pm. It was simply easier to pick up what we wanted from the supermarket or bakery (there are so many nearby) and relax at home with a prepared meal, 

The bathroom (I loved the additional half bathroom) is accommodating and provided us with ample room to get situated each day without really bumping into one another. 

The bedroom has a king size bed that is comfortable and coupled with the black out blinds we were able to sleep very soundly. There is ample closet space with plenty of drawers to put clothes in. Also I really liked having a safe in the bedroom (please note there were no security issues with building at all) as it allowed us to store more personal items away.

The wifi and the cable television were an extra benefit as it allowed us to be in touch with friends and family as needed in addition to decompress and talk with each other after a long day of seeing the sites. 

Even thou this apartment is comfy and packed with amenities you may find yourself reluctant to leave however it is vitally important to see the vast number of neighborhoods (Palermo, La Boca, San Telmo just to name a few) in Buenos Aires. I highly recommend that you contact Maria to secure this apartment.
A estadia foi perfeita, a localização do apartamento é ótima e a Maria Inês e o Luiz são muito atenciosos.
Maria is great and her apt is clean and comfortable. Maria and her friend Luis are always willing to help arrange transportation and give recommendations. We really enjoyed our stay.

Very nice apartment in Palermo and very clean.
Amazing view of Buenos Aires from the apartement and roof top.
The area was excellent.
Maria was very reactive to reply to any requests.
I definitly recommend this apartment.
The apartment was exactly as in the pictures and the host was amazing. Everything was a breeze! Best Air bnb experience ever.

Maria Ines was incredibly responsive, usually within a few minutes, and provided lots of useful information, as did her agent in BA. The apartment is beautiful and comfortable, and the rooftop pool a plus. She has thought of every detail and provided everything anyone would need. It is also well-located, close to shopping, supermarket, restaurants, and public transport. Couldn't be improved--it was perfect!
Die Wohnung ist modern eingerichtet und hat einen sensationellen Blick vom Balkon über die Stadt. Toll auch Sauna und Schwimmingpool.

This was an excellent apartment and I would absolutely stay here again if I ever return to Buenos Aires! Check in went smoothly as Maria uses a check in service which is excellent. Luis was there to let us into the apartment, show us around, and answer questions as well as helping us to exchange our dollars. He spoke excellent English which is a plus if you don't speak much Spanish. The apartment was clean, large, and beautifully furnished. A bottle of Malbec was there to welcome us. The view in this apartment was by far the best part - we could not get enough of it! The apartment was in a very safe neighborhood and there are friendly doormen on site 24 hours. 

I have nothing bad to say about this apartment! Really enjoyed my stay in Buenos Aires because of our choice to stay here!

Das Appartement ist sehr schön, modern und befindet sich in einer guten Lage. Es war sehr einfach das Appartement zu mieten und online zu bezahlen. Alles hat reibungslos funktioniert, vom check in bis zum check out. Der Blick vom Balkon aus ist atemberaubend.
This apartment is a real gem. It is very well-located, comfortable, and stylish. Maria was very helpful with information and we felt welcomed.
The appartment is perfect. Great location and very modern. Everything awesome and the hosts are very kind.

Maria saved the end of my vacation.  I sent her a request the day I was hoping to rent her apartment after my vacation plans unexpected changed and I was left without a place to stay in Buenos Aires.  Not only did Maria almost immediately respond to my request but she able to accommodate me in her beautiful apartment for three days.  The apartment was wonderful with nice touches like a bottle of wine and welcoming beers.  The bed was amazingly comfortable the entire apartment was quiet and relaxing.  The location was perfect because it was quiet at night but only a short walk to all that Palermo had to offer.  I would definitely recommend an experience with Maria and her cute apartment in the middle of the action.

Everything about our experience was very positive.  It was very easy to book and to pay on line and our host was extremely attentive in helping us get to know the neighbourhood and in finding all the services we needed.  Check in and out were both very simple and professional, and on arrival we were provided with maps and tips on where to find local restaurants.  Guide books were available also, along with a bottle of Argentine Malbec wine!
Our host was on top of things as they happened and checked regularly to ensure things were alright.  
The apartment was lovely and suited our needs very well.  It was well equipped, in a beautiful building with a lovely pool and great city view and good security with friendly door staff and a useful safe in the bedroom.  Bed was super comfortable and there were plenty of towels as well as access to a washing machine.  The apartment appliances were all up to date with no issues.
Our host went above and beyond by assisting us in finding accommodation when we initially arrived in Buenos Aires and she helpfully stored our luggage while we toured Patagonia before coming back for our stay in the apartment.
We will definitely recommend this host and her lovely and convenient accommodation to our friends.  
The district, Palermo Soho, is a popular area with lots of attractions, but is also handy for getting to the centre of town and all the other areas.  We enjoyed using the local buses along Santa Fe and Cordoba and exploring the local coffee shops and cafes.

Wonderful apartment! Great big bed, fully equipped kitchen, two bathrooms!! The pool on the roof was beautiful and very helpful after a day of walking in Bs As. Also, the apartment has possibly the best views of the city! We absolutely loved our time there, thank you!
Had a great stay, the location is perfect and the apartment is just as described and shown in the pictures.

Airbnb Review

Maria’s apartment was wonderful! Staying there contributed hugely to our enjoyable stay in Buenos Aires. 

The apartment is beautifully appointed and had all the amenities needed for us to feel quite at home and more independent than a hotel stay. We especially appreciated the very complete kitchen, the balcony, the pool, air-conditioning, the Wi-Fi, and a secure front entrance (with a door guard).

The location is central- in a neighborhood that is full of character and also very safe.  Many of the B.A. sights we were most interested in seeing were easily accessible from the apartment via longish walks, short (U$S5-7) cab rides or subway. It is fairly close to several Subte stations, which made it convenient to travel to more distant areas.

Maria’s representative Luis was on site when we arrived. He is an extremely personable young man and was very helpful and kind.

In short, we felt this apartment was perfect for us and loved staying there. Thank you Maria!

Chris & Max

Amazing apartment! Spacious, well equipped, perfect rooftop terrace and pool. We loved the location, it made our stay in buenos aires perfect! Maria is a great host: reliable, helpful and very quick to respond to messages. I highly recommend this apartment!

This apartment is very convenient, clean, comfortable and has everything you need to spend a great holiday in Buenos Aires. 

We've had two amazing weeks stay at this place and we'd certainly come back! As you can see from the photos, this apartment is very modern, located in the best area of the city and has a beautiful view from the balcony. There's a gym on the 20th floor and a beautiful pool with an incredible view on the top floor 21. 

Maria Ines responded to our request to stay at her place almost immediately, helped us with directions and even suggested quite a number of tips for our stay in this beautiful city .

We were welcomed by Luis - the man responsible for the check-in and check out - and i must say that he's a great man. He was very friendly and extremely helpful. We arrived late in the night to the apartment and he was kind enough to wait for us and made us feel at home from the first minute.

This is a great place to stay and we would definitely recommend it to our friends!

Thanks once again Maria Ined and Luis! Happy New Year and all the best!

A experiência foi perfeita, o apartamento excelente, limpo, todo equipado com tudo que você precisaria, melhor e mais bonito que nas fotos anunciadas, noa deixou nada a desejar. Fomos muitos bem recebidos com cervejas, vinho e toda simpatia do Luiz (administrador do apartamento), alem de todas as orientações, dicas sobre locais, transporte, moedas. Durante toda a viagem Luiz e Maria Ines mantiveram contato esclarecendo duvidas, enviando mapas e dicas preciosas de Buenos Aires, com muitas opções de locais para visitar, comer, etc. Os funcionários do condomínio também muito educados e prestativos. Bairro tranquilo, seguro, bem frequentado, com ótimas opções de restaurante. Ótimo para um caminhada, principalmente nos fins de semana. Enfim, foi tudo (URL HIDDEN) certeza recomendo

First, the place was perfect. Very nice building, beautifully maintained apartment. Exactly as listed. We were met on time in a very friendly way. All our questions were answered. The neighborhood was great. If I ever return to Buenos Aires, this is the first place I'd look up.
Luis was friendly, helpful and efficient, and the apartment was great--had everything I needed (even an umbrella and grocery cart!), was well located, and the rooftop pool a plus!

The description was very accurate; the apartment was beautiful, clean, and spacious. The location is great as it is within walking distance of the major parks, Recoleta neighborhood, and the best shopping/restaurants in Palermo. Note that it is about 8-10 blocks from the heart of Palermo's restaurant and shopping area but is quite close to the parks, the lake, and the rose garden as well.

The building has security and they were very helpful and friendly! The view from the balcony is stunning at sunset as well. We used the gym and it was very functional.

Our host's liason met us in BA to give us keys and his contact information and Ines provided information regarding taxis to/from the airport. There was wine and beer waiting in the apartment and everything was easy! We very much enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this listing.

We had a very nice stay in the apartment. It was big enough for 2 and everything was just like we expected. Nice bed, bathroom and kitchen. A great view from the balcony! We would certainly stay again! The apartment was convenient for eating in Palermo or visiting plaza de Mayo by subte.

Maria arranged for her representative to check me in to the apartment. It was exactly as described, in a great location with an abundance of great restaurants, bars and cafes nearby, it was spotlessly clean with a great bathroom, huge bed and a stunning view of the city from the balcony. She had thoughtfully left wine, beer and water and a folder with contact numbers, emails addresses, wifi password. From the moment the booking was confirmed, Maria was in contact to find out about my itinerary as she wanted to know if she could provide assistance with a transfer from the airport. Upon checking in, we spoke briefly on the phone.

The only problem I had was that I wasn't there longer. I'm already making plans to return for another visit. Well recommended.

Really great location and the views over the city are quality. A short stroll to Palermo with all its shops, bars and restaurants. The only problem was to open the two beers in the fridge or the complementary bottle of wine first.

The apartment was just like in the pictures, like it came from a magazine. It was immaculate and comfortable. The location was good and even though I didn't meet Maria Ines, she made sure to have a very nice and attentive young man to greet me and explain how things at the apartment worked. She left a nice bottle of wine, water and beer as a compliment which was really nice. She did call and I spoke with her on the phone to check that everything was right. Overall a great stay, only good things about this apartment. Oh and the view was unbeatable! Would definitely recommend this place!

Maria made me feel very welcome. A bottle of wine and some beers in the fridge greeted me when I arrived which was a very pleasant start to my stay. The apartment is exactly as advertised if not better. It is really nicely decorated and very relaxing after my days in Buenos Aires. I could not really ask for more! Palmero is a very good neighbour and felt very safe. There a lots of good restaurants bars & shopping a short walk from apartment. Also the subway stop is close for exploring the city further. Check-in and out was very smooth and Maria organised airport transfers for my arrival & departure. I would highly recommend Maria's apartment.

This was the surprise apartment of our stay.  It was much bigger than we expected, and very well equipped for our needs.  It is a great jumping off point if you are looking to start your trip in Buenos Aires.  Ines was great at communication and her host that greeted us was: waiting when we arrived, knowledgeable about the area and the building, and made a point to check in by phone a few times during our stay. We would book this place again in a heartbeat.

Ines' apartment on Gorriti was wonderful.  I was down for business for a week and a half, and preferred to stay in an apartment rather than a hotel.  It was exactly as described and as I had hoped.  After a full day at the office, coming to the apartment was like a home away from home.  It was very clean and comfortable.  Ines was a great host, she called to check in several times to ensure everything was going well.  I would recommend this apartment and Ines, and look forward to staying here again next time I am in Buenos Aires.
Amazing apartment in a great location in Buenos Aires. Everything on your doorstep and good gym facilities in the building. Very secure and highly recommended. Would definitely stay again

Fomos pontualmente recebidos, com o apartamento impecável e um vinho com duas taças esperando na mesa e duas cervejas geladas na geladeira...
Maria Inés foi muito atenciosa e solicita. Ofereceu dicas e ate uma linha de telefone para ligações locais, e dois cartões de SUBE para poder usar o transporte publico de Buenos Aires.
O apartamento e muito bonito, perfeitamente equipado (com toalhas e lençóis novos e uma cozinha com tudo que pode precisar) e o sistema de aquecimento central e ótimo!
Usamos também a lavanderia e a academia do prédio que foi um plus!
A localização e muito boa, já que fica perto de tudo mais num local tranquilo.
Definitivamente recomendo este apartamento e esta anfitriã, adorarei voltar em outra viagem!

After a long day of sightseeing, there was nothing more my husband and I looked forward to than returning to the comforts of Ines's apartment. It was straight out of the pages of an interior decoration magazine with a wonderfully comfortable bed and magnificent views of Buenos Aires. Though Ines was away in Toronto at the time, she was a great host and called us up every now and again to make sure we were ok. She even welcomed us to the apartment with a bottle of wine, which was a really nice touch. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend her place and will stay again next time I visit.

Maria Ines é fantástica, é a segunda vez que me hospedo em uma propriedade sua em Buenos Aires e tudo correu perfeitamente bem...
Extremamente gentil nos recebeu com uma garrafa de vinho e cervejas geladinhas como "regalos"...
